channel.title: SWS:SE - Against the Sith Conspiracy (3 session series)
channel.description:
This is a 3 session series of Against the Dark Conspiracy, hacked for Star Wars Saturday. The first session is timed to coincide with this year's 'Special Edition Celebration'. ![2021 10 08 Against the Sith 01|323x500](upload://ofcyJF2cliwjcTNwT9DTy9pLxrE.jpeg)
Sunday 5 Dec, 2021: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MlWBVkb1eml1IN7oBIg Sunday 12 Dec, 2021: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MlWBgEI4JvE0gmehYLn Sunday 19 Dec, 2021: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MlWBnWWhYeW119JHbuh
Join a deniable team sponsored by the New Republic and discover what horrors lurk beneath the surface of Zinsj's Empire?
